title: How to publish an eBook or earn money with it - Quora

response.answer_text: I will answer your question assuming that you wanted to say how do I publish ebook and earn money, since I can’t think of many ways by which you can earn money without publishing it. The simplest ways to do it is open and account with Amazon Kdp Write your ebook, publish the same with KDP Join Amazon Select program, get 70% royalty from that.
